[[module CSS]]
:root {
       --basalt-overtone: 100, 100, 100;
       --basalt-undertone: var(--basalt-bright-element-color);
       --basalt-UI-dark-palette: 20, 20, 20;
       --basalt-bright-element-color: 231, 29, 29;
       --basalt-dark-element-color: 105, 17, 30;
       --basalt-alternate-color: 225, 45, 45;
       --basalt-primary-color: 0, 0, 0;
       --basalt-secondary-color: 5, 5, 5;
       --basalt-tertiary-color: 20, 20, 20;
       --basalt-main-text-color: 190, 190, 190;
}

.authorlink-wrapper {
    --author-top-adjust: -0.2rem;
    --author-bottom-adjust: -0.35rem;
}

body {background: black;}
[[/module]]
